categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Drefin was a male Human who served as a colonel in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War. Serving on the planet Quesh during the Quesh war, Drefin was one of Moff Dracen's chief advisers.
Colonel Drefin appears on Quesh in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011.
